name: Reincarnation
description: You attempt to call back the willing soul of a beast or humanoid into a random, empty vessel on your current plane. The required check increases by 1 for each year the soul has been dead (maximum +10). If you fail this check, you cannot target that soul again.
charge: You can reincarnate the soul into a specific body of a humanoid or beast that has died within the last day, bypassing the one year minimum.
